allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: resolve all Dependabot security alerts

- Update dependencies via npm audit fix to address 14 security vulnerabilities
- Fix node-forge ASN.1 vulnerabilities (high severity)
- Fix js-yaml prototype pollution issues (medium)
- Fix webpack-dev-server source code theft vulnerabilities (medium)
- Fix http-proxy-middleware body parsing issues (medium)
- Fix @babel/helpers and @babel/runtime RegExp complexity (medium)
- Fix estree-util-value-to-estree prototype pollution (medium)
- Fix brace-expansion ReDoS vulnerability (low)
- Fix on-headers response header manipulation (low)
- Temporarily disable rspackBundler for Docusaurus 3.9.2 compatibility

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(security\): resolve Dependabot security alerts

- Update qs to ~6.14.0 to fix arrayLimit bypass DoS vulnerability \(high severity\)
- Update mdast-util-to-hast to fix unsanitized class attribute issue \(moderate severity\)

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(npx wrangler kv namespace create CHAT_SESSIONS)

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add AI chat widget with Cloudflare Workers AI

- Add ChatWidget component for right-bottom corner chat interface
- Add Cloudflare Worker backend with Workers AI integration
- Support streaming responses and session management
- Include RAG infrastructure for document-based Q&A \(optional\)

Worker deployed at: https://ai-chat-worker.chanmeng-dev.workers.dev

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: enhance chat widget with white background, i18n support, and RAG

- Change chat widget background from transparent to solid white/dark
- Add i18n support for Chinese and English languages
- Enable RAG functionality with Cloudflare Vectorize
- Add document seeding endpoint for vector embeddings

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
